sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT [Id]
      ,[CustomerName]
      ,[CustomerNumber]
      ,[MaterialNumber]
      ,[Application]
      ,[FileName]
      ,[filePath]
      ,[PurchaseOrder]
      ,[Item]
      ,[Size]
      ,[Description]
      ,[Qty]
      ,[WindingMethod]
      ,[UOM]
      ,[UnitPriceCur]
      ,[NetAmount]
      ,[DeliveryDate]
      ,[VendorNumber]
      ,[VendorName]
      ,[VATNumber]
      ,[OrderAddressName]
      ,[OrderAddressStreet]
      ,[OrderAdressPostalCode]
      ,[OrderAdressCity]
      ,[OrderAdressCountry]
      ,[Telephone]
      ,[VendorEmail]
      ,[Date]
      ,[TermsofPayment]
      ,[ContactPerson]
      ,[Email]
      ,[DeliveryAdressName]
      ,[DeliveryAdressNameAddition]
      ,[DeliveryAdressStreet]
      ,[DeliveryAdressPostalCode]
      ,[DeliveryAdressCity]
      ,[DeliveryAdressCountry]
      ,[BillingAdressName]
      ,[BillingAdressStreet]
      ,[BillingAdressPostalCode]
      ,[BillingAdressCity]
      ,[BillingAdressCountry]
      ,[BillingE-Mail]
      ,[BillingcustomerVATNumber]
      ,[ResidentCountryVATID]
      ,[HeaderText]
      ,[SubTotal]
      ,[TotalAmount]
      ,[modified_timestamp]
      ,[FolderHierarchy]
      ,[KeyColumn]
      ,[IsErrorDQ]
      ,[DescriptionDQ]
   
      ,[ERPDeliveryAddressStreet]
      
      ,[insertedDate]
      ,[IsApproved]
      ,[Approver]
      ,[ApproverComments]
      ,[ApprovalTimestamp]

 FROM [app].[tbl_aaa_CustomerOrderData]
WHERE IsApproved=0 and FileName='@{item().FileName}' and ApprovalTimestamp between (SELECT last_modified_date FROM app.tbl_watermarktable WHERE table_name ='app.tbl_Order_Creation_Inputs') and '@{pipeline().parameters.pipeline_starttime}'

WITH CTE
AS (
	SELECT DISTINCT CustomerNumber
	,CustomerName
	,FileName FROM [app].[tbl_aaa_CustomerOrderData] WHERE ApprovalTimestamp BETWEEN (
			SELECT last_modified_date
			FROM app.tbl_watermarktable
			WHERE table_name = 'app.tbl_Order_Creation_Inputs'
			) and '@{pipeline().parameters.pipeline_starttime}' and IsApproved=0 
	) SELECT CTE.CustomerName
	,CTE.CustomerNumber
	,CTE.FileName FROM CTE 
	JOIN [app].[tbl_MainControlTable] MC ON MC.CustomerNumber = CTE.CustomerNumber

folder.name: Child Pipelines/Child Pipelines Post-UI/Rejected Data Ingestion
